title: Adobe air programmer needed
snippet:
I am looking for someone to program a data scraper programmed in adobe air so it works on a mac and a pc. The program is a very basic program and should be real easy to do.

Basically I want to enter a bunch of keywords in a box.  The Program would then go to amazon and search each of those keywords. For each keyword I would like to know how many of the results on the first page have the keywords in the exact match plus how many do not.  It can be shown as 

keyword 1 20% exact match 80 percent non match X percent have zero words
keyword 2 20% exact match 80 percent non match X percent have zero words
keyword 3 20% exact match 80 percent non match X percent have zero words
keyword 4 20% exact match 80 percent non match X percent have zero words

Keywords with higher than 60% non match should be green. Those with less red
